ygData.subject: Re: Into the "Cybertronian" Fire
ygData.msgSnippet: Incarcinator is very very high up in the air, and his shells go way way too fast to be intercepted by flares. ... Killfest watches the four seeking missiles

X-Sender: Yanshosh@...

Received: from unknown (HELO ef.egroups.com) (10.1.2.111) by mta1 with SMTP; 11 Apr 2001 17:47:50 -0000
X-eGroups-Return: Yanshosh@...
Received: from [10.1.2.33] by ef.egroups.com with NNFMP; 11 Apr 2001 17:47:50 -0000
Date: Wed, 11 Apr 2001 17:47:45 -0000
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: Into the "Cybertronian" Fire
Message-ID: <9b25c1+b9gf@...>
In-Reply-To: <db.12f72b22.28057165@...>
User-Agent: eGroups-EW/0.82
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1
Content-Length: 14703
X-Mailer: eGroups Message Poster
From: Yanshosh@...

Incarcinator is very very high up in the air, and his shells go way 
way too fast to be intercepted by flares.

::Killfest/EndBringer/Zardus/Incarcinator/Scyther/Demise/Prowl/Kluster
::

Killfest watches the four seeking missiles approach him, and jumps at 
the last second. The explosion under him sends him flipping through 
the air, but he stabolizes himself and flies upward. Aiming at 
Vehement again, he fires two seeking missiles from his shoulder and 
four EMP blasts from his rifle, these blasts spread out so it would 
be harder for Vehement to dodge.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
EndBringer roars, firing a missile at four missiles fired at him. The 
missile explodes, taking out the four. He jumps to the side as 
another missiles nearly hits him, and then is hit by one more, 
sending him flipping to the ground near Imprisoner. He roars, jumping 
up.

Seeing Imrisoner, EndBringer lashes out with his tentacles while 
jumping at the bot, trying to grab him in his tentacles.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Zardus spins in the air, several rapid-fire rounds passing near him. 
He aims and fires back at Unitron, two energy draining missiles, 
along with two normal ones, flying for the bot.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Incarcinator saw the orb heading for him long before it was even 
close, and easily flew out of the way. He adjusts the color of the 
metal he was made of so that he'd be transparent, and nearly 
impossible to see considering how high in the air he was. The bot 
growls, firing shell after shell down at Demon Wulf, Unitron, and 
Shockwave.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Scyther smiles, watching an explosion take place under him. He had 
been flying up ever since he fired, and was now well out of range.

Taking out a device from a storage compartment, Scyther taps a few 
buttons on it and tosses it at Injector. The device stays cloaked as 
it leaves Scyther's cloaking field. It was a cloaked grenade.

Landing noiselessly near Injector, the grenade waits one second 
before it goes off, making a large explosion. Scyther fires two 
charges down at Injector, knowing that he would be distracted due to 
the explosion.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Demise turns his hand, grabbing Flesh Ripper's in it and avoiding the 
claws aimed at it as his other hand graps Flesh Ripper's torso. He 
tugs with all his strength on the arm, knowing that he had enough 
power to rip bots apart.

Flesh Ripper's other slash hits his stomach, scratching the armor but 
doing nothing more.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Prowl was going to fast for the lasers to hit, but he noticed massive 
firepower heading for the CF. In the back of his mind, the part that 
was still Prowl, he smiles to himself.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Kluster watches all the firepower hit the sheilds. Soon they would 
probably drop, but the CF's outer shell was nearly prepared by now. 
He knew it would be able to stand up to the beating even without the 
shields.





--- In nbwrpg@y..., KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> (I'm still waiting for Orchid's response, but by request of Yan 
I'll post 
> anyways.  And Airly, the Brotherhood has no gestalts, so none of 
them are 
> around in response to your question.
> 
> Also, who is in control of the CF, posting damage wise that is?  
Just want to 
> know who to yell at.)
> 
> The Protectobots/The Oblitercons/Demon Wulf/Flesh Ripper/Dark 
Claw/Nemesis
> 
Enforcer/Scattershot/Imprisoner/Predator/Choran/Shockwave/Unitron/Fire
starter/
> Double Punch/Manterror/Injector/Vehement/Sun 
Crusher/Reflector/Smokescreen/
> Serpentor/Teufel/Unicron:
> 
> 
> 
> Unicron flew alongside his newest creation.  Teufel.  In a language 
from 
> Earth (German) "teufel" meant "devil".  It didn't really fit the 
nature of 
> this newest addition to the Brotherhood ranks.  The Chaos-Bringer 
just liked 
> the sound.
> 
> At first glance, most would say Teufel was rather bland and nothing 
special.  
> At a second and closer glance, the assumptions would be confirmed.  
His body 
> was armored above average, and a few cannons were hidden inside his 
frame.  
> He was far from defenseless.  Just featureless.  It looked like he 
had no 
> mouth, audio receptors, 'nose', or optics.  No sign of a beast or 
alternate 
> mode.
> 
> "Teufel, arm your missiles.  In a while we will arrive at the 
battle and aid 
> my followers." Unicron ordered.
> 
> "Understood." a bland, monotone and overall boring voice replied.  
A robot 
> wouldn't want to get into a long conversation with someone with a 
voice like 
> that.  It'd be...just plain to boring.
> 
> ===
> 
> Demon Wulf was struck by a few laser bolts and growled, but he was 
close to 
> merging.  He fired a widespread of flames from his mouth, 
intercepting four 
> missiles heading for him from Silverbolt and Depth Charge.  The 
resulting 
> explosions sent some light flames and small amount of shrapnel at 
Demon Wulf, 
> but the Vok creation ignored it to the best of his abilities.
> 
> He raised his sword, firing off an energy-signature seeking missile 
at 
> Silverbolt's abdomen.
> 
> ---
> 
> Flesh Ripper saw the inbound Demise and chuckled, slashing out with 
his right 
> arm's, his claws out and ready to show why exactly he had been 
named "Flesh 
> Ripper" (hence his claws are above the average animals...) at 
Demise's right 
> hand (assuming he's reaching with both arms).
> 
> Simultaneously with his left arm he slashed diagonally up at the 
Predacon's 
> abs, the boosters in his feet charging up quickly ready to blast 
off at top 
> speed.
> 
> ---
> 
> Dark Claw felt several shots hit him, yet he continued, rising in 
the air 
> rapidly in his biped form.  In his right hand formed a black orb of 
energy 
> with the destructive capability of a charge.  The Vok threw the orb 
down 
> towards Incarninator.
> 
> ---
> 
> Dark One had reached Hiss, and discontinued his firing upon Demon 
Wulf 
> because of the ineffectiveness and the task before him.  "Hold on 
you idiot." 
> he chuckled to Hiss, taking out a few basic repair tools, getting 
to work on 
> Hiss, hoping no one would be cheap.
> 
> ---
> 
> Breakdown pushed up, five rapid optic blasts piercing into his 
shoulder and 
> two more into his right pec.  He stumbled back in pain, cursing and 
returning 
> fire with three optic blasts at the insect bot, making his way 
towards Dark 
> One.
> 
> ---
> 
> Pyro cursed as his shots did absolutely nothing to Abominus.  Of 
course, if 
> his fire balls didn't hurt Vehement, they certainly weren't going 
to hurt a 
> 'bot two or three times bigger than the Brotherhood leader.
> 
> "Oh, slag!" he yelled, jumping quickly, the laser blast from 
Abominus leavin' 
> a crater and sending Pyro flipping through the air, landing on his 
right arm.
> 
> ---
> 
> Hiss and Scavenger remained down for the count and in stasis lock.
> 
> ---
> 
> (Gonna wait for Rdhal to get back to continue fight between Hot 
Spot and 
> Headstrong)
> 
> ---
> 
> Groove looked to Abominous and if he could've would've crapped in 
his pants.  
> Stunned with fear, the shot from the Decepticon gestalt struck him 
dead on, 
> sending him flipping back a dozen feet and crashing down.
> 
> He had a large gash in his chest and he stood still, trying to 
recollect his 
> thoughts that seemed slightly out of reach.
> 
> ---
> 
> Blades saw Groove's predicament and pulled off his attack.  He 
armed his 
> fourteen missile tube and launched off four missiles at Abominous' 
cervix.
> 
> ---
> 
> First Aid remained a charred mess.
> 
> ---
> 
> Streetwise dived to his right, landing on his side and rolling.  As 
he rolled 
> he fired off four blasts from his photon pistol.  He intercepted 
two incoming 
> missiles, one nearly hitting him and sending shrapnel into his 
face.  He let 
> out a yell and stopped rolling, covering his face.  A missile 
struck him in 
> the back and he went limp for a second.  Then he started twitching 
as he 
> started to save strength for a second wind.
> 
> ---
> 
> Blasts strike Imprisoner and his entire frame shakes.  "Idiots.  I 
doubt 
> they've even caught on by now." he said to himself.  He noticed the 
tide of 
> battle, but didn't want to completely give himself away.  Until he 
noticed an 
> insignificant robot open fire on Choran.
> 
> He armed his launchers, firing off four more missiles at the 
Cybertronian 
> Fire as he did an intense scan to determine the strength of the 
shields.
> 
> The cannon on his form swiveled, firing off three blasts at Prowl.
> 
> ---
> 
> Predator painfully got to his feet, firing off two rockets at the 
> Cybertronian Fire.  Weapons fire struck him and almost knocked him 
off 
> balance but he stayed on his feet.
> 
> ---
> 
> Choran saw incoming missiles and simply fired off five rapid optic 
blasts to 
> intercept them.  He raised his rifle, firing off twenty rapid laser 
blasts at 
> Depth Charge's torso.
> 
> ---
> 
> Shockwave was interested.  Everyone was going at a relatively less 
important 
> warrior.  Unitron.  Since no one fired at him other than easily 
dodgable 
> autogun fire, he decided to aid his comrade in arms.  He armed four 
flares, 
> launching them off to intercept weapons fire.  One intercepted 
Incarcinator's 
> shells.  One missed its target.  One going off prematurely to take 
out 
> Zardus' missiles.  And the last but not least destroying the 
missiles heading 
> for Sun Crusher.
> 
> He armed his own missile launchers, tired of saving fellow 
Decepticons who 
> couldn't handle things themselves.  He launched off two missiles at 
the 
> Cybertronian Fire, logic telling him victory was within his grasp.  
Once the 
> shields fell, it would all be over for the ship.
> 
> ---
> 
> Autogun fire raked along the fire-red space fighter's frame doing 
little 
> damage, and a flare from the same fighter intercepted two seeking 
missiles 
> from the Element.  He armed his launchers, firing off two energy-
signature 
> seeking missiles at Endbringer.
> 
> From his nosecone ten rapid laser blasts erupted as he rolled 
through the 
> air, the energy heading for the Cybertronian Fire.
> 
> ---
> 
> Unitron's worries were down quite a bit when all that was heading 
for him was 
> fifty rounds.  He dived down and did a barrel roll, several shells 
embedded 
> into his wing and frame but not hitting anything to vital.
> 
> A blast from another enemy pierced through his back dorsal fins and 
hurt his 
> velocity, but he was still fast as lightning striking the ground 
again and 
> again.  He fired off twenty-five rapid laser blasts at Zardus' 
pelvis.  He 
> launched one energy-signature seeking missile at Killfest and 
another heading 
> for Rhinox.
> 
> ---
> 
> Beeline fired ten rapid blasts from its optics, only intercepting 
three 
> charges inbound for its creator.
> 
> ---
> 
> Double Punch felt a charge striking him in the back, but he held 
his ground.  
> He turned around with a deep pain in his chest as some kind of 
liquid leaked 
> down his back.  He raised his scorpion tail.  Using visuals from 
Beeline, he 
> was able to deduce almost exactly where the cloaked enemy was if he 
hadn't 
> moved.  He raised both pinchers, firing off four missiles so that 
the area 
> where the cloaked enemy was would be the center.  The resulting pre-
mature 
> explosions from his missiles would hit that area and anything in a 
20 yrd 
> radius (including up and down).
> 
> He began modifying his scanners internally to try and at least get 
a fringe 
> like affect for his attacker at least.  He made a note to add an 
upgrade to 
> his optic sensors.
> 
> ---
> 
> Injector felt a few optic blasts impact and he flew back through 
the air 
> slightly.  "Slagger." he yelled, firing down two stinger missiles 
at the very 
> temporarily downed Breakdown.
> 
> ---
> 
> Manterror shook from shots as his exo-skeleton took all the hits.  
He cursed 
> in rage, firing off two ion disks from both arms.  Two ion disks 
headed for 
> Perceptor, the other two for the Cybertronian Fire.
> 
> ---
> 
> Smokescreen looked to the Predacon, Killfest, and noted he was 
firing at 
> Vehement.  He powered up his optics, ready to open fire, but 
stopped.  He 
> couldn't take on Vehement alone, and whoever was firing on Vehement 
would be 
> helpful.  He would only take down Vehement's attacker when Vehement 
himself 
> were down.
> 
> He raised his rifle, getting a clear shot on Vehement, who still 
hadn't 
> noticed the Warrior of Light.  Smokescreen would wait for the 
perfect moment, 
> when Vehement replied to Killfest's attack with a barrage of deadly 
force.
> 
> ---
> 
> Vehement slid through the air gracefully, a missile and the EMP 
bolt going by 
> him.  He swung his left arm, piercing through the missile and 
causing it to 
> explode.  It charred from his left hand's fingertips to the 
forearm.  There 
> were even some shrapnel pieces stuck in him.
> 
> He ignored it though, raising his right arm that had a large barrel 
where a 
> hand, forearm, and elbow should be.  He launched off two energy-
signature 
> seeking missiles.
> 
> He raised his left arm, a near invisible sonic wave shooting out at 
the 
> Cybertronian Fire.
> 
> ---
> 
> Sun Crusher watched missiles heading for him get intercepted and he 
simply 
> sighed.  It was a test of endurance, this battle.  He didn't need 
heathens 
> helping him.  He raised both arms, launching four missiles down at 
EndBringer.
> 
> ---
> 
> Reflector laughed at Streetwise.  "Take that heathen dog!" he 
yelled, filling 
> with laughter.  He raised his right arm, the double-barreled weapon 
attached 
> to it launching off two missiles from each barrel.  Four missiles 
spread out, 
> two energy-signature seeking missiles heading for Killfest.  The 
other two 
> missiles were regular missiles that headed for the Cybertronian 
Fire.
> 
> ---
> 
> Scattershot flew hard left, easily avoiding the behemoth, 
Abominous', shot.  
> "Hm." he said, reaching into subspace for the appropriate weapon of 
> destructive capability.
> 
> ---
> 
> Nemesis Enforcer touched down to the ground, rifle aimed at 
Serpentor's neck 
> as he began walking towards his enemy.  He fired a few shots, but 
the snake 
> rolled out of the way.
> 
> As he adjusted his aim, Serpentor threw his plasma launcher at 
Nemesis.
> 
> ---
> 
> The plasma launcher soared true, striking Nemesis dead on in the 
face and 
> sending him sprawling back.  "Take that batman!" he hissed, 
reaching into 
> subspace and taking out his sword.  He walked briskly towards 
Nemesis 
> Enforcer, sword at the ready to slice down and decapitate a robot.
